Student_Course_RegistrationObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Student_Course_RegistrationObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

description: Element Container for Student Grade Update Data HV

validation.validation: To specify a grade note, ensure that grade notes are enabled for the grade on the grading scheme.
Submit grade notes for grades that have Grade Note Required enabled on the grading scheme.
For each course registration, specify either a Proposed Grade or set Remove Grade to 1.
Specify grades that don't have either of these grade category types: Academic Period Withdraw and Course Section Withdraw.
You can only change the grade on a student's course registration when the registration has a Completed status.
To specify a last date of attendance, ensure that it is enabled for the grade on the grading scheme.
Specify a Last Date of Attendance for grades that are configured to require a last date of attendance on the grading scheme.
You can't specify a Grade Change Reason when removing a grade.
Ensure that the Proposed Grade is on the grading scheme used for the course registration.
Ensure that the Proposed Grade is on the grading basis used for the course registration.
Enter a Last Date Of Attendance that is on or between the course section start and end dates: [Start Date] and [End Date].
